MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:50PM to safely carry out repair works on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:50 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
